# mediaPlaybackRequiresUserAction

**Instance Property**

Deprecated property.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mediaPlaybackRequiresUserAction: Bool { get set }
```

## Deprecated

- **mediaPlaybackAllowsAirPlay**: Deprecated property.
- **requiresUserActionForMediaPlayback**: A Boolean value that indicates whether HTML5 videos require the user to start playing them (`true`) or whether the videos play automatically (`false`).
